content.prompt: Which of the following was most central to the development of the early Industrial Revolution?

choices.label: The shift from human and animal power to mechanical power
The substitution of unionized for independent labor
The decline of individual enterprise in favor of cooperative efforts
The shift from coal to oil-fired forges

topic.text: 6.10: Causation in the Age of Industrialization

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
